greetings: Hello! Welcome to MJVI Realty! I'm your virtual assistant and I'm here to guide you through our platform. What would you like to learn about?
Hi there! I can help you understand how our real estate platform works - from searching properties to closing deals. What interests you?
Welcome to MJVI Realty! I'll walk you through everything step-by-step. Whether you're buying, selling, or just exploring, I'm here to help!

how_to_get_started.question: How do I get started?
how_to_get_started.answer:
Let me walk you through getting started with MJVI Realty:

STEP 1: Visit the Homepage
• Go to the MJVI Realty website
• You'll see a beautiful homepage with property search
• You can browse without an account, but signing up unlocks more features

STEP 2: Create Your Free Account
• Click the 'Get Started' or 'Register' button (top-right corner)
• Fill in your details:
  - Full name
  - Email address
  - Password (make it secure)
  - Phone number (optional but helpful)
• Click 'Sign Up'

STEP 3: Verify Your Email
• Check your email inbox
• Click the verification link we sent you
• This confirms your account is real

STEP 4: Complete Your Profile
• After verification, you'll be redirected to your profile
• Choose your role: Buyer, Seller, or Agent
• Add a profile photo (optional)
• Fill in additional details if needed

STEP 5: Explore Your Dashboard
• Once logged in, you'll see your personalized dashboard
• For Buyers: See saved properties, searches, and inquiries
• For Sellers: Manage your listings and inquiries
• For Agents: Access all your tools and client communications

STEP 6: Start Using the Platform
• Search for properties using the search bar
• Save your favorite properties
• Contact agents directly through chat
• Set up alerts for new listings

That's it! You're all set to find your dream property or list yours for sale.

need_account.question: Do I need an account?
need_account.answer:
No account is needed to browse properties! However, creating a free account gives you access to:

• Save favorite properties
• Chat with agents and property owners
• Create and save custom searches
• Receive instant alerts for new listings
• Submit inquiries and make deals
• Schedule property visits (tripping)
• List your own properties

Sign up is quick and completely free!

is_free.question: Is the platform free to use?
is_free.answer:
Yes! MJVI Realty is free for buyers. You can:

• Browse unlimited properties
• Search and filter listings
• Contact agents
• Save favorites
• Make inquiries and deals

For sellers and agents, basic listing is free, though premium features and featured listings may have fees. Check our pricing page for details!

how_to_list_property.question: How can I list my property?
how_to_list_property.answer:
I'll guide you through listing your property step-by-step:

BEFORE YOU START - Prepare These:
• High-quality photos of your property (at least 5-10)
• Property title or proof of ownership
• Property details (size, age, features)
• Clear asking price

STEP 1: Log In to Your Account
• Go to MJVI Realty website
• Click 'Sign In' (top-right)
• Enter your email and password
• If you don't have an account, register first as a 'Seller'

STEP 2: Access Listing Dashboard
• Once logged in, click on your profile picture or name
• Select 'Dashboard' from the dropdown menu
• Look for 'My Properties' or 'Listings' section
• Click the '+ Add New Property' or 'List Property' button

STEP 3: Fill in Basic Information
• Property Type: Select from dropdown (House & Lot, Condo, Land, Commercial, etc.)
• Listing Type: Choose 'For Sale' or 'For Rent'
• Property Name/Title: Give it an attractive title (e.g., 'Modern 3BR House in Makati')

STEP 4: Add Location Details
• Complete Address: Street, Barangay, City, Province
• Use the map picker to pinpoint exact location
• Add landmark descriptions (e.g., 'Near SM Mall')
• The system will auto-suggest as you type

STEP 5: Enter Property Specifications
• Lot Area: Size in square meters
• Floor Area: For houses/condos
• Number of Bedrooms: Use dropdown
• Number of Bathrooms: Use dropdown
• Number of Parking Spaces
• Year Built or Property Age

STEP 6: Set Your Price
• Enter asking price in Philippine Pesos
• Choose price type: Total Price or Price per Square Meter
• Mark if 'Negotiable'
• Add payment terms if applicable (cash, installment, etc.)

STEP 7: Add Property Features
• Check all applicable amenities:
  - Swimming pool, Garden, Balcony
  - Security features, Gated community
  - Nearby schools, hospitals, malls
• This helps buyers find your property through filters

STEP 8: Upload Photos (Very Important!)
• Click 'Upload Photos' button
• Select 5-10 high-quality images minimum
• First photo will be the main listing image
• You can drag to reorder photos
• Include: Exterior, Living room, Bedrooms, Kitchen, Bathroom, Special features
• Photos should be clear, well-lit, and show the property's best angles

STEP 9: Write a Compelling Description
• Describe your property in detail (200-500 words)
• Highlight unique features and recent improvements
• Mention nearby establishments and accessibility
• Be honest about the property condition
• Use clear, easy-to-read language

STEP 10: Upload Documents (Optional but Recommended)
• Title/Deed of Sale
• Tax Declaration
• Property Tax Receipts
• These build trust with potential buyers
• Documents are encrypted and secure

STEP 11: Set Your Contact Preferences
• Choose how buyers can reach you:
  - Through platform messaging (recommended)
  - Phone number (will be displayed)
  - Email notifications
• Enable/disable viewing schedules

STEP 12: Review and Submit
• Click 'Preview' to see how your listing will look
• Check all information for accuracy
• Make any necessary edits
• Click 'Submit for Review' button

STEP 13: Wait for Approval
• Our team reviews all listings within 24-48 hours
• We verify property details and photos
• You'll receive an email notification when:
  - Your listing is approved and published
  - We need more information

STEP 14: Your Listing Goes Live!
• Once approved, your property appears in search results
• You'll receive notifications when:
  - Someone favorites your property
  - Buyers send inquiries
  - Someone requests a viewing

STEP 15: Manage Your Listing
• You can edit your listing anytime from your dashboard
• Respond to inquiries promptly
• Update photos or price as needed
• Mark as 'Sold' when you close the deal

TIPS FOR A GREAT LISTING:
• Use professional or high-quality photos
• Be detailed in your description
• Price competitively based on market research
• Respond quickly to inquiries
• Keep your listing updated
• Consider featuring your listing for more visibility

Need help? Contact our support team anytime!

property_information_needed.question: What information do I need to list a property?
property_information_needed.answer:
To create a complete property listing, prepare:

Required Information:
• Property location and full address
• Price and pricing type (total, per sqm, negotiable)
• Property type (House & Lot, Condo, Land, Commercial)
• Lot area and floor area (in sqm)
• Number of bedrooms and bathrooms
• Property title and status

Highly Recommended:
• At least 5-10 high-quality photos
• Detailed property description
• GPS coordinates or map location
• Property documents (title, tax declaration)
• Special features and amenities
• Year built or age of property

The more details you provide, the more attractive your listing will be to potential buyers!

how_to_search.question: How do I search for properties?
how_to_search.answer:
Let me show you how to search for properties step-by-step:

METHOD 1: BASIC SEARCH (Quick and Easy)

STEP 1: Go to Homepage
• Visit MJVI Realty website
• You'll see a prominent search bar in the hero section

STEP 2: Enter Your Search
• Type what you're looking for in the search bar:
  - Location: "Makati", "BGC", "Quezon City"
  - Property type: "Condo", "House", "Land"
  - Keywords: "2 bedroom", "near mall", "with pool"
• The system will show auto-suggestions as you type

STEP 3: Select Property Type (Optional)
• Below the search bar, choose:
  - House & Lot
  - Condominium
  - Land/Lot
  - Commercial
  - All (to see everything)

STEP 4: Click Search
• Press Enter or click the search button
• Results will load showing matching properties

METHOD 2: ADVANCED FILTERS (Detailed Search)

STEP 1: Access Advanced Filters
• From search results page, click 'Filters' or 'Advanced Search'
• A filter panel will appear on the left side

STEP 2: Set Your Budget
• Move the price range slider
• Or enter min and max price manually
• Example: ₱2M to ₱5M

STEP 3: Choose Location
• Select Region, Province, City, or Municipality
• You can select multiple locations
• Use the dropdown menu or type to search

STEP 4: Property Type
• Check boxes for property types you want:
  - Residential (House, Condo, Townhouse)
  - Commercial (Office, Retail, Warehouse)
  - Land/Lot

STEP 5: Property Size
• Lot Area: Set min/max square meters
• Floor Area: For houses and condos
• Use sliders or enter values directly

STEP 6: Rooms and Facilities
• Bedrooms: Select 1, 2, 3, 4, or 5+ bedrooms
• Bathrooms: Choose number of bathrooms
• Parking: Specify parking spaces needed

STEP 7: Features and Amenities
• Check boxes for desired features:
  - Swimming Pool
  - Garden/Backyard
  - Balcony/Terrace
  - Security/Gated Community
  - Near Schools
  - Near Shopping Centers
  - Near Hospitals

STEP 8: Property Condition
• Brand New
• Resale
• For Renovation
• Move-in Ready

STEP 9: Listing Age
• New Listings (last 24 hours)
• This Week
• This Month
• Any Time

STEP 10: Apply Filters
• Click 'Apply Filters' or 'Show Results' button
• Properties matching ALL your criteria will appear

METHOD 3: MAP SEARCH (Visual Location-Based)

STEP 1: Switch to Map View
• From search results, click the 'Map View' icon/button
• Or directly click 'Map Search' from homepage

STEP 2: Navigate the Map
• Zoom in/out using + and - buttons
• Drag the map to move around
• Each property is shown as a marker/pin

STEP 3: Draw Custom Search Area
• Click the 'Draw' tool button
• Choose shape: Circle, Rectangle, or Polygon
• Draw on the map where you want to search
• Only properties within your drawn area will show

STEP 4: Click Property Markers
• Click any marker to see property preview
• Shows: Photo, Price, Name, Basic details
• Click 'View Details' to see full listing

STEP 5: Use Map Filters
• Combine map search with filters
• Set price range, property type while viewing map
• Results update in real-time

VIEWING SEARCH RESULTS:

STEP 1: Browse Results
• Properties display as cards with:
  - Main photo
  - Price
  - Location
  - Size (sqm)
  - Bedrooms/Bathrooms

STEP 2: Sort Results
• Sort by:
  - Price: Low to High or High to Low
  - Newest First
  - Most Relevant
  - Lot Size
• Click the 'Sort by' dropdown and choose

STEP 3: Save Properties You Like
• Click the heart icon on any property card
• Property is added to your 'Favorites'
• Access favorites anytime from your dashboard

STEP 4: View Property Details
• Click on any property card
• Opens full property page with:
  - All photos (swipeable gallery)
  - Complete description
  - All specifications
  - Location map
  - Agent contact
  - Similar properties

STEP 5: Compare Properties
• Select multiple properties using checkboxes
• Click 'Compare' button
• View side-by-side comparison of:
  - Prices
  - Sizes
  - Features
  - Locations

SAVING YOUR SEARCH:

STEP 1: Create Search Alert
• After setting your filters, click 'Save Search'
• Give your search a name (e.g., "3BR Makati Condo")

STEP 2: Set Alert Preferences
• Choose notification frequency:
  - Instant (as soon as new listing matches)
  - Daily digest
  - Weekly summary
• Select notification method: Email and/or Push

STEP 3: Manage Saved Searches
• Go to Dashboard > Saved Searches
• View all your saved searches
• Edit, delete, or turn alerts on/off
• You'll get notifications when new properties match

PRO SEARCH TIPS:

• Use specific keywords for better results
• Start broad, then narrow with filters
• Save multiple searches for different criteria
• Check new listings daily for best opportunities
• Use map view to understand neighborhood context
• Compare similar properties before deciding
• Turn on alerts to not miss new listings

Need help refining your search? Just ask me!

filter_by_location.question: Can I filter properties by location?
filter_by_location.answer:
Absolutely! MJVI Realty has robust location filtering:

Multiple Ways to Search by Location:

1. Search Bar - Type any city, municipality, or province
2. Location Filter - Use the dropdown to select specific areas
3. Interactive Map:
   • View all properties on a map
   • Click areas to see available listings
   • Draw custom boundaries around your preferred areas
4. Neighborhood Search - Search by popular neighborhoods and subdivisions

We Cover 120+ Cities across the Philippines including:
• Metro Manila areas
• Cavite, Laguna, Bulacan, Rizal (CALABARZON)
• Cebu, Davao, and other major cities
• And expanding monthly!

You can also combine location filters with price, property type, and size for precise results!

save_favorites.question: How do I save my favorite properties?
save_favorites.answer:
Saving properties you love is easy:

To Save a Property:
1. Create a free account (if you haven't already)
2. Browse or search for properties
3. Click the heart icon on any property card
4. The property is instantly saved to your favorites!

Access Your Favorites:
• Go to your Dashboard
• Click 'My Favorites' or 'Saved Properties'
• View all your saved listings in one place
• Compare properties side-by-side
• Remove properties you're no longer interested in

Bonus Tip:
Set up alerts for saved searches to get notified when similar properties are listed!

make_inquiry.question: How do I make an inquiry?
make_inquiry.answer:
Let me guide you through making an inquiry step-by-step:

OPTION 1: QUICK INQUIRY FROM LISTING

STEP 1: Find Your Property
• Search or browse properties
• Click on a property you're interested in
• Opens the property details page

STEP 2: Locate Inquiry Button
• Look for buttons like:
  - 'Inquire Now'
  - 'Contact Agent'
  - 'I'm Interested'
  - 'Send Inquiry'
• Usually found near the top or with agent info

STEP 3: Click the Inquiry Button
• A form or chat window will appear
• Your information (if logged in) is pre-filled

STEP 4: Fill in the Inquiry Form
Your Information (if not logged in):
• Full Name
• Email Address
• Phone Number
• How did you hear about us? (optional)

Your Message:
• Pre-made templates available:
  - "I'm interested in this property"
  - "I'd like to schedule a viewing"
  - "I have questions about this property"
• Or write a custom message

Additional Details:
• Preferred contact method: Email, Phone, or Chat
• Best time to contact you: Morning, Afternoon, Evening
• Viewing schedule preference (if applicable)
• Are you pre-qualified for a loan? Yes/No
• Urgency: Just browsing / Actively looking / Ready to buy

STEP 5: Review Your Inquiry
• Check that all information is correct
• Make sure your message is clear
• Include specific questions if you have any

STEP 6: Submit Inquiry
• Click 'Send Inquiry' or 'Submit' button
• You'll see a confirmation message:
  "Your inquiry has been sent!"

STEP 7: Confirmation
• You'll receive:
  - On-screen confirmation
  - Email confirmation to your inbox
  - Copy of your inquiry message
• Inquiry reference number for tracking

OPTION 2: DETAILED INQUIRY WITH QUESTIONS

STEP 1: Open Property Page
• Navigate to the property you want
• Click to view full details

STEP 2: Click 'Inquire with Questions'
• Look for expanded inquiry option
• Some listings have detailed inquiry forms

STEP 3: Fill Detailed Form
Basic Information:
• Your full name
• Email and phone

About You:
• Buyer type: First-time buyer / Upgrading / Investor
• Financing: Cash / Bank loan / Developer financing
• Timeline: Immediate / 1-3 months / 3-6 months / Just exploring

Your Questions (Check relevant boxes):
• Is the property still available?
• What's included in the price?
• Is the price negotiable?
• Can I schedule a viewing?
• Are there monthly dues or fees?
• What's the neighborhood like?
• Are pets allowed?
• What are the nearby schools/malls?

Additional Message Box:
• Add any specific questions not covered
• Mention special requirements
• Note preferred viewing dates

STEP 4: Submit Complete Inquiry
• Click 'Send Detailed Inquiry'
• Agent receives comprehensive information
• Better prepared to answer all your questions

WHAT HAPPENS AFTER YOU INQUIRE:

IMMEDIATE (0-5 Minutes):
• Agent receives instant notification:
  - Email alert
  - SMS alert (if enabled)
  - Dashboard notification
  - Mobile app push notification
• Your inquiry appears in agent's inbox
• Property details are attached automatically

WITHIN 1-2 HOURS:
• Most active agents respond within 2 hours
• You receive notification of response:
  - Email: "You have a new message from [Agent Name]"
  - Browser notification
  - SMS (if enabled)

WITHIN 24 HOURS:
• If agent hasn't responded:
  - System sends reminder to agent
  - You can follow up or contact another agent
  - You can view other similar properties

YOUR INQUIRY DASHBOARD:

STEP 1: Track All Inquiries
• Go to Dashboard > My Inquiries
• See all properties you've inquired about

STEP 2: View Inquiry Status
Each inquiry shows:
• Property thumbnail and name
• Date and time sent
• Status:
  - Sent (waiting for response)
  - Read (agent saw it)
  - Replied (agent responded)
  - Scheduled (viewing booked)
  - Closed (deal completed or cancelled)

STEP 3: Manage Inquiries
• Click to view full conversation
• Mark as favorite for quick access
• Set reminders to follow up
• Archive old inquiries
• Compare responses from different properties

MULTIPLE INQUIRIES:

You Can Inquire About Multiple Properties:

STEP 1: Create Comparison List
• Send inquiries to 3-5 properties
• Note down key details from each

STEP 2: Compare Responses
• See which agent responds fastest
• Compare information provided
• Evaluate agent professionalism

STEP 3: Track in One Place
• Dashboard shows all inquiries
• Easy to compare and decide
• Organize by priority

FOLLOW-UP STRATEGIES:

If No Response After 24 Hours:

STEP 1: Send Follow-Up Message
• Go to your inquiry
• Click 'Send Follow-up'
• Add: "Just checking if you received my inquiry?"

STEP 2: Try Alternative Contact
• If phone number provided, call directly
• Try messaging through platform chat

STEP 3: Contact Another Agent
• Look for similar properties
• Send inquiry to alternative listings
• Don't wait too long on one property

INQUIRY BEST PRACTICES:

DO:
• Be clear about what you want to know
• Provide accurate contact information
• Respond promptly when agent replies
• Ask all your questions upfront
• Be honest about your timeline and budget
• Mention if you're viewing other properties
• Keep conversations professional

DON'T:
• Send the same inquiry multiple times
• Provide fake contact information
• Ignore agent responses
• Make lowball offers immediately
• Share too much financial info too soon
• Ghost agents after inquiring

WHAT TO INCLUDE IN YOUR INQUIRY MESSAGE:

Example Good Inquiry:
"Hello! I'm interested in your 3BR condo in Makati. I'm looking to move within 3 months and have been pre-approved for a bank loan. Could you please tell me:

1. Is this property still available?
2. Are the condo dues current?
3. Can I schedule a viewing this weekend?
4. Is the price negotiable?

I'm a serious buyer and would appreciate a prompt response. You can reach me at [phone] or this email. Thank you!"

Why This Works:
• States interest clearly
• Shows you're serious (pre-approved)
• Asks specific questions
• Provides timeline
• Gives contact options
• Professional tone

TRACKING YOUR INQUIRY JOURNEY:

Step-by-Step Progress:

1. Inquiry Sent
• You submit inquiry
• Status: Pending

2. Agent Received
• Agent sees your inquiry
• Status: Read

3. Agent Responded
• You get response
• Status: Replied

4. Viewing Scheduled
• Date/time confirmed
• Status: Viewing Scheduled

5. Property Viewed
• You visited property
• Status: Viewed

6. Offer Made
• You submitted offer
• Status: Negotiating

7. Deal Closed
• Agreement reached
• Status: Closed/Won

REMEMBER:
• Inquiries are free and unlimited
• No obligation to proceed
• Your information is protected
• Agents are verified professionals
• Keep all communication in platform for security
• Save copies of important conversations
• You can inquire about multiple properties
• Response times vary by agent

Need help with a specific inquiry? Let me know!

deal_process.question: How does the deal process work?
deal_process.answer:
Our deal process is transparent and secure:

Step-by-Step Deal Process:

1. Initial Contact
• Make an inquiry on a property
• Chat with the agent/owner

2. Property Viewing
• Schedule a viewing (we call it 'tripping')
• Visit the property in person or request virtual tour

3. Make an Offer
• Submit your offer through our platform
• Negotiate terms directly with the seller
• Counter-offers are handled in real-time

4. Agreement
• Once both parties agree on terms
• Review all property documents
• Our system tracks the deal status

5. Documentation & Closing
• Upload and e-sign necessary documents
• Work with lawyers and brokers
• Complete payment and transfer of ownership

Track Everything:
• View deal status in your dashboard
• Get notifications at each stage
• Secure messaging for all communications
• Document repository for all paperwork

All transactions are monitored for security and transparency!

negotiate_price.question: Can I negotiate prices?
negotiate_price.answer:
Yes! Price negotiation is encouraged on MJVI Realty:

How to Negotiate:

1. Make an Inquiry - Contact the property owner/agent
2. Express Interest - Show you're a serious buyer
3. Make Your Offer - Submit your proposed price through the platform
4. Discuss Terms - Chat directly about:
   • Payment terms
   • Inclusions/exclusions
   • Move-in dates
   • Repairs or improvements

Negotiation Tips:
• Research comparable properties in the area
• Be respectful and reasonable
• Have your financing ready
• Consider total value, not just price
• Be prepared to compromise

Our Platform Helps:
• Transparent offer/counter-offer system
• Written record of all negotiations
• Deal tracking and status updates
• Secure communication channel

Most sellers expect some negotiation, especially for properties listed as 'negotiable'!

platform_features.question: What features does the platform offer?
platform_features.answer:
MJVI Realty is packed with powerful features:

For Buyers:
• Advanced property search with AI filters
• Interactive map with custom boundary drawing
• Save favorite properties
• Saved searches with instant alerts
• Direct messaging with agents
• Schedule property viewings (tripping)
• Submit and track inquiries
• Make and manage deals
• Virtual tours and photo galleries
• Compare properties side-by-side

For Sellers:
• Easy property listing creation
• Upload unlimited photos
• Property performance analytics
• Manage inquiries in one place
• Respond to offers instantly
• Verified buyer connections
• Featured listing options

General Features:
• Multi-language support (English & Filipino)
• Mobile-responsive design
• Real-time notifications
• Secure document handling
• E-signature capability
• Verified listings (anti-scam)
• 24/7 customer support
• Transparent pricing

Security & Trust:
• Verified documentation
• User reviews and ratings
• Anti-scam controls
• Secure messaging

chat_with_agents.question: Can I chat with agents?
chat_with_agents.answer:
Yes! Let me show you exactly how to contact and chat with agents:

METHOD 1: CHAT FROM PROPERTY LISTING

STEP 1: Find a Property
• Browse or search for properties
• Click on a property that interests you
• This opens the full property details page

STEP 2: Locate Agent Information
• Scroll down to the 'Agent Information' or 'Contact' section
• You'll see:
  - Agent's name
  - Agent's photo
  - Agent's company/broker
  - Response rate and time

STEP 3: Click 'Message Agent' Button
• Look for the 'Message Agent', 'Chat Now', or 'Contact Agent' button
• It's usually prominently displayed near agent info
• Click the button

STEP 4: Login (If Not Already)
• If you're not logged in, you'll be prompted to:
  - Sign in to your account
  - Or quickly sign up (takes 1 minute)
• This is required for security and to save your conversations

STEP 5: Write Your Message
• A chat window will open
• The property details are automatically attached to your message
• Write your message, for example:
  "Hi! I'm interested in this property. Is it still available?"
  "Can I schedule a viewing this weekend?"
  "What's included in the price?"
  "Is the price negotiable?"

STEP 6: Send Your Message
• Click the 'Send' button or press Enter
• Your message is delivered instantly to the agent
• Agent receives a notification immediately

STEP 7: Wait for Response
• Most agents respond within minutes during business hours (9AM-6PM)
• You'll receive a notification when they reply:
  - Browser notification (if enabled)
  - Email notification
  - SMS (optional)

STEP 8: Continue the Conversation
• Chat in real-time with the agent
• Ask follow-up questions
• Share files if needed (photos, documents)
• Schedule viewings directly through chat

METHOD 2: CHAT FROM DASHBOARD

STEP 1: Go to Your Dashboard
• Click your profile picture (top-right)
• Select 'Dashboard' or 'My Account'

STEP 2: Access Messages
• Click on 'Messages', 'Inbox', or 'Chats' in the sidebar
• You'll see all your conversations

STEP 3: View Conversations
• Conversations are organized by property
• Each chat shows:
  - Property thumbnail
  - Agent name
  - Last message preview
  - Unread message count (if any)

STEP 4: Click to Open Chat
• Click on any conversation to open it
• Continue chatting with the agent
• All message history is preserved

METHOD 3: GENERAL INQUIRY (Without Specific Property)

STEP 1: Visit Agent Profile
• Browse agents in the 'Find an Agent' section
• Or click agent name from any listing

STEP 2: View Agent Details
• See agent's:
  - Profile and credentials
  - Areas of expertise
  - Current listings
  - Reviews and ratings

STEP 3: Contact Agent
• Click 'Contact This Agent' or 'Send Message'
• Write your general inquiry:
  "I'm looking for a 3BR condo in Makati under ₱5M"
  "Do you have listings in BGC area?"

STEP 4: Agent Will Respond
• Agent can send you relevant listings
• You can discuss your requirements
• They'll help match you with properties

CHAT FEATURES YOU CAN USE:

1. Send Text Messages
• Type and send messages
• Messages deliver instantly
• See "delivered" and "read" status

2. Share Photos
• Click the photo/attachment icon
• Select images from your device
• Useful for sharing:
  - ID for verification
  - Payment proof
  - Your own property photos (if selling)

3. Share Documents
• Upload PDF files
• Share property documents
• Send financial requirements
• Max file size: 10MB per file

4. Schedule Viewings
• Many agents have 'Schedule Viewing' button in chat
• Click it to select date and time
• Agent confirms availability

5. Make Video Calls (With Some Agents)
• Some agents offer video chat
• Click the video call icon
• Have virtual property tours

6. Send Quick Replies
• Use pre-set quick responses:
  - "I'm interested"
  - "When can I view?"
  - "Is this still available?"
  - "What's your best price?"

CHAT ETIQUETTE & TIPS:

• Be clear about what you're looking for
• Respond promptly to agent messages
• Be respectful and professional
• Ask all your questions upfront
• If serious, provide your contact number
• Don't share financial info too early
• Keep all communication in the platform (for security)

MANAGING YOUR CONVERSATIONS:

STEP 1: Notification Settings
• Go to Account Settings > Notifications
• Choose how you want to be notified:
  - Push notifications (instant)
  - Email (for each message or daily digest)
  - SMS (optional)
• Turn notifications on/off per conversation

STEP 2: Mark Important Chats
• Star/favorite important conversations
• They'll appear at the top of your inbox

STEP 3: Archive Chats
• Archive conversations you're done with
• They're hidden but not deleted
• Can be retrieved anytime

STEP 4: Block or Report
• If an agent is unprofessional:
  - Click the 3-dot menu in chat
  - Select 'Report' or 'Block'
  - Our team will investigate

WHAT TO ASK AGENTS:

About the Property:
• "Is this property still available?"
• "When was it built?"
• "Why is the owner selling?"
• "What's included in the sale?"
• "Are there any issues or needed repairs?"

About Viewing:
• "Can I schedule a viewing?"
• "Can I bring my contractor/inspector?"
• "Do you offer virtual tours?"

About Price:
• "Is the price negotiable?"
• "What's the lowest price the owner will accept?"
• "Are there any additional fees?"

About Process:
• "What documents do I need?"
• "How long is the process?"
• "Can you help with financing?"

REMEMBER:
• Agents are verified professionals
• Response times may vary
• Keep all negotiations in writing
• Use chat to build rapport
• Don't hesitate to contact multiple agents
• All chats are monitored for quality
• Your conversations are encrypted and secure

Need help with a specific question? Just ask!

map_view.question: Is there a map view?
map_view.answer:
Yes! We have an advanced Interactive Map feature:

Map Features:

Basic Functions:
• View all available properties on a map
• Zoom in/out to explore areas
• Click markers to see property details
• Street view and satellite view options

Advanced Tools:

Draw Custom Boundaries:
• Draw circles, polygons, or rectangles
• Search only within your drawn area
• Perfect for finding properties in specific neighborhoods

Location-Based Search:
• See properties near landmarks
• Find properties near schools, malls, offices
• Distance calculator

Smart Clustering:
• Properties are grouped by area
• Click clusters to zoom in
• Color-coded by property type or price range

Map Filters:
• Show/hide property types
• Filter by price range on map
• See only available properties

Pro Tips:
• Use map view to discover hidden gems in areas you love
• Compare property density across neighborhoods
• Check proximity to amenities and transport

Access the map view from the main search page or property listings!

property_tripping.question: How do I schedule a property viewing?
property_tripping.answer:
Property viewings (we call them 'tripping') are easy to schedule:

Schedule a Viewing:

1. Find Your Property and view its details
2. Click 'Schedule Viewing' or 'Book a Tour' button
3. Choose Your Preferences:
   • Preferred date and time
   • Type of visit (in-person or virtual)
   • Number of people joining
   • Special requests or questions
4. Submit Request
5. Get Confirmation from the agent (usually within hours)

Viewing Options:

In-Person Visit:
• Physical site inspection
• Meet the agent on-site
• Explore the property and neighborhood

Virtual Tour:
• Live video call with the agent
• Detailed walkthrough
• Perfect for buyers from other locations

What Happens Next:
• Agent confirms your schedule
• You receive a booking confirmation
• Get directions and contact details
• Receive reminders before the viewing
• Rate your experience after the visit

Track All Viewings:
View all your scheduled, completed, and cancelled trips in your dashboard!

Tip: Schedule multiple viewings in the same area to save time and compare properties!

documents_needed.question: What documents do I need as a buyer?
documents_needed.answer:
As a buyer, here are the documents typically needed:

For Making an Offer:
• Valid government-issued ID
• Proof of income (if financing)
• Pre-approval letter from bank (if applicable)

For Closing the Deal:

If Paying Cash:
• Valid IDs
• Proof of funds
• TIN (Tax Identification Number)
• Marriage certificate (if applicable)

If Financing Through Bank:
• Bank pre-approval letter
• Latest payslips (3-6 months)
• ITR (Income Tax Return)
• Certificate of employment
• Bank statements
• Valid IDs
• TIN

At Closing:
• Deed of Absolute Sale
• Transfer Certificate of Title
• Tax Declaration
• Proof of payment

Document Security:
• Upload documents securely through our platform
• E-sign documents online
• Encrypted storage
• Shared only with authorized parties

Our partner lawyers and brokers can guide you through the entire documentation process!

seller_requirements.question: What documents do I need as a seller?
seller_requirements.answer:
As a seller, prepare these documents for listing and selling:

For Listing Your Property:
• Valid government-issued ID
• Proof of ownership (Title or Contract to Sell)
• Recent photos of the property
• Property details and specifications

For Selling (Full Documentation):

Essential Documents:
• Transfer Certificate of Title (TCT) or Condominium Certificate of Title (CCT)
• Tax Declaration
• Latest Real Property Tax Receipt
• Certified True Copy of Title
• Certificate Authorizing Registration (CAR)
• Valid IDs of all registered owners
• TIN (Tax Identification Number)

Additional Documents:
• Location plan/vicinity map
• Building permit (for houses)
• Approved building plans
• Association dues clearance (for condos/subdivisions)
• Marriage certificate (if applicable)
• Special Power of Attorney (if not the direct seller)

At Closing:
• Deed of Absolute Sale
• Acknowledgment receipt
• Tax clearance

Upload Securely:
All documents are encrypted and stored safely. We verify documents to prevent fraud and protect both buyers and sellers!

Having complete documents makes your listing more attractive to serious buyers!

payment_methods.question: What payment methods are accepted?
payment_methods.answer:
MJVI Realty supports various payment options for property transactions:

Common Payment Structures:

1. Cash Payment:
• Full cash payment
• Bank transfer
• Manager's check
• Safest for both parties

2. Bank Financing:
• Home loans from major banks
• Pag-IBIG housing loan
• In-house financing from developers
• Our partners can help with loan applications

3. Installment Plans:
• Developer financing (for new projects)
• Owner financing (seller holds the contract)
• Flexible terms depending on agreement

4. Combination:
• Down payment + bank financing
• Partial cash + installment balance

Payment Handling:
• Secure escrow services available
• Payment milestones tracked in platform
• Official receipts for all transactions
• Transparent fee breakdown

Our Partner Banks:
• BDO, BPI, Metrobank, Security Bank
• Pag-IBIG Fund
• And more!

Platform Fees:
• Browsing and searching: FREE
• For buyers: NO fees
• For sellers: Basic listings are free, premium features may have fees

The specific payment method depends on the agreement between buyer and seller!

safety_security.question: Is the platform safe and secure?
safety_security.answer:
Absolutely! Security and trust are our top priorities:

Security Measures:

Property Verification:
• All listings reviewed by our team
• Document verification
• Agent/seller identity confirmation
• Property ownership validation
• Anti-scam controls

User Safety:
• Encrypted data transmission
• Secure login (password protection)
• Privacy controls
• Report suspicious listings
• User reviews and ratings
• Verified agent badges

Transaction Security:
• Secure messaging system
• Document encryption
• E-signature with legal validity
• Payment tracking (not handling)
• Escrow service recommendations

Scam Prevention:
• Multi-step listing review
• AI fraud detection
• Duplicate listing checks
• Price anomaly alerts
• Report-a-listing feature

Human Support:
• Local support team available 7 days/week
• Responds to concerns within 24 hours
• Can mediate disputes
• Provides guidance throughout transactions

Privacy:
Your personal information is never sold or shared. We comply with Data Privacy laws.

Safety Tips:
• Always meet in public places initially
• Verify documents independently
• Use our platform for all communications
• Never wire money to unverified accounts
• Report suspicious activity immediately

Your safety is our mission!

mobile_app.question: Is there a mobile app?
mobile_app.answer:
Currently, MJVI Realty is a fully responsive web platform that works perfectly on mobile browsers!

Mobile Web Features:
• Optimized for all screen sizes
• Fast loading on mobile data
• Touch-friendly interface
• Works on iOS and Android
• All desktop features available
• Add to home screen for app-like experience

How to Use on Mobile:
1. Open your mobile browser (Chrome, Safari, etc.)
2. Visit our website
3. Bookmark for easy access
4. (Optional) Add to home screen:
   • iOS: Tap share → 'Add to Home Screen'
   • Android: Tap menu → 'Add to Home Screen'

Native App Coming Soon:
We're developing native mobile apps for iOS and Android with enhanced features like:
• Push notifications for new listings
• Offline property browsing
• Faster performance
• Camera integration for AR property viewing
• Expected launch: Q3 2025

For now, our mobile web version provides a seamless experience with all the features you need!

how_notifications_work.question: How do notifications work?
how_notifications_work.answer:
Let me explain our notification system step-by-step:

TYPES OF NOTIFICATIONS YOU'LL RECEIVE:

1. Property Alerts
• New listings matching your saved searches
• Price drops on properties you favorited
• Properties back on market
• Similar properties to ones you viewed

2. Inquiry & Message Notifications
• Agent responds to your inquiry
• New messages in your chats
• Someone inquired about your listing (for sellers)

3. Viewing (Tripping) Notifications
• Viewing request confirmed
• Viewing reminder (24 hours before)
• Viewing reminder (1 hour before)
• Viewing feedback request (after visit)

4. Deal Updates
• Offer received/accepted/countered
• Document upload requested
• Payment milestone reminders
• Deal status changes

5. Account Notifications
• Login from new device
• Profile update confirmations
• Listing approval/rejection
• Subscription renewals

HOW TO SET UP NOTIFICATIONS:

STEP 1: Access Notification Settings
• Click your profile picture (top-right)
• Select 'Settings' or 'Account Settings'
• Click 'Notifications' tab

STEP 2: Choose Notification Channels

Email Notifications:
• Toggle on/off for each type
• Choose frequency:
  - Instant (as it happens)
  - Daily digest (once per day)
  - Weekly summary
• Enter/confirm email address

Push Notifications (Browser):
• Enable push notifications
• Browser will ask permission
• Click 'Allow'
• Get instant alerts even when site is closed

SMS Notifications (Optional):
• Add phone number
• Verify with code
• Choose which alerts to receive via SMS
• Standard messaging rates may apply

In-App Notifications:
• Always enabled
• See notification bell icon (top-right)
• Red badge shows unread count

STEP 3: Customize by Type

For Each Notification Type, Set:
• Enabled or Disabled
• Delivery method (Email, Push, SMS, In-App)
• Frequency
• Priority level

STEP 4: Save Your Preferences
• Click 'Save Settings' button
• You'll see confirmation message
• Changes take effect immediately

VIEWING YOUR NOTIFICATIONS:

STEP 1: Click Notification Bell
• Located in top-right corner
• Bell icon shows unread count
• Click to open notification panel

STEP 2: Browse Notifications
• Most recent appears first
• Each shows:
  - Type icon
  - Message summary
  - Time received
  - Read/Unread status

STEP 3: Take Action
• Click notification to:
  - View full details
  - Go to related page
  - Respond to message
  - View property
• Or just mark as read

STEP 4: Manage Notifications
• Mark individual as read
• Mark all as read
• Delete notifications
• Filter by type
• Search notifications

SAVED SEARCH ALERTS:

How They Work:

STEP 1: Create Saved Search
• Set your property criteria
• Click 'Save Search'
• Name your search

STEP 2: Set Alert Preferences
• Choose alert frequency:
  - Instant (recommended)
  - Once daily
  - Twice daily
  - Weekly
• Select notification method

STEP 3: Receive Alerts
• When new property matches:
  - Get notified immediately
  - Email includes property details
  - Click link to view property

STEP 4: Manage Alerts
• Dashboard > Saved Searches
• Turn alerts on/off
• Edit search criteria
• Delete searches you don't need

NOTIFICATION BEST PRACTICES:

• Enable instant alerts for saved searches (don't miss good deals)
• Use daily digest for general updates
• Turn off notifications you don't need
• Check notifications at least twice daily
• Respond to agent messages promptly
• Keep email address updated
• Enable push notifications for best experience

TROUBLESHOOTING:

Not Receiving Notifications?

1. Check Email Spam/Junk Folder
• Our emails might be filtered
• Mark as 'Not Spam'
• Add our email to contacts

2. Verify Email Address
• Go to Settings > Account
• Check if email is verified
• Resend verification if needed

3. Check Browser Settings
• Allow push notifications for our site
• Browser Settings > Notifications
• Ensure not blocked

4. Check Notification Settings
• Confirm notifications are enabled
• Check correct channels are selected
• Save changes again

5. Contact Support
• If still not working
• We'll check your account
• Usually resolved within hours

Stay updated with all your property activities!

dashboard_guide.question: How do I use my dashboard?
dashboard_guide.answer:
Let me walk you through your dashboard step-by-step:

ACCESSING YOUR DASHBOARD:

STEP 1: Log In
• Sign in to your MJVI Realty account
• Automatically redirected to dashboard
• Or click 'Dashboard' from menu

STEP 2: Dashboard Overview
• See personalized homepage
• Quick stats and summaries
• Recent activity
• Quick action buttons

DAShBOARD FOR BUYERS:

Main Sections:

1. OVERVIEW TAB
• Saved properties count
• Active inquiries count
• Scheduled viewings
• Recent searches
• Recommended properties

2. MY FAVORITES
• All properties you've saved
• Grid or list view
• Sort by: Date saved, Price, Location
• Click to view or remove
• Compare multiple properties

3. MY SEARCHES
• All your saved searches
• See search criteria
• Edit search parameters
• Enable/disable alerts
• Delete old searches
• View matching properties

4. MY INQUIRIES
• All properties you've contacted about
• Inquiry status:
  - Pending
  - Replied
  - Scheduled
  - Viewed
  - Offer Made
• Filter by status
• Search inquiries
• Quick reply to agents

5. MESSAGES/INBOX
• All your conversations
• Organized by property
• Unread message count
• Quick reply feature
• Search conversations
• Archive old chats

6. MY VIEWINGS (TRIPPING)
• Upcoming viewings
• Past viewings
• Cancelled viewings
• Calendar view
• Viewing details:
  - Property info
  - Date and time
  - Agent contact
  - Location/directions
• Add to your calendar
• Reschedule or cancel

7. MY DEALS
• Active negotiations
• Deal pipeline:
  - Offer Submitted
  - Under Negotiation
  - Accepted
  - Pending Documents
  - In Progress
  - Closed
• Documents uploaded
• Payment schedule
• Next steps

8. SETTINGS
• Profile information
• Password change
• Notification preferences
• Privacy settings
• Language preference

DASHBOARD FOR SELLERS:

Main Sections:

1. OVERVIEW TAB
• Total listings
• Active listings
• Total views
• Total inquiries
• Performance graph

2. MY PROPERTIES
• All your listings
• Status indicators:
  - Active
  - Pending Review
  - Sold
  - Draft
• Quick actions:
  - Edit listing
  - Mark as sold
  - Delete
  - Feature property
• Add new property button

3. PROPERTY ANALYTICS
• Views per property
• Inquiries per property
• Favorites count
• Best performing listings
• Engagement over time
• Compare with similar properties

4. INQUIRIES RECEIVED
• All buyer inquiries
• Sort by:
  - Newest first
  - Hot leads
  - Property
• Inquiry details:
  - Buyer information
  - Message
  - Preferred contact method
  - Timeline
• Respond directly
• Mark as lead/not interested

5. VIEWING REQUESTS
• Pending requests
• Confirmed viewings
• Completed viewings
• Approve/decline requests
• Propose alternative times
• View buyer feedback

6. MESSAGES
• Conversations with buyers
• Organized by property
• Quick reply templates
• Set auto-responses

7. DEALS IN PROGRESS
• Active negotiations
• Offers received
• Counter-offers sent
• Deal status tracking
• Document checklist

8. EARNINGS & PAYMENTS
• Listing fees (if any)
• Featured listing costs
• Payment history
• Invoices

USING DASHBOARD WIDGETS:

Customize Your Dashboard:

STEP 1: Click 'Customize Dashboard'
• Button usually in top-right of dashboard
• Or in settings menu

STEP 2: Choose Widgets
• Drag and drop widgets
• Add or remove sections
• Resize widgets
• Arrange in preferred order

STEP 3: Popular Widgets
• Quick search
• Recent activity feed
• Favorite properties slider
• Viewing calendar
• Message center
• Market insights
• Recommended properties
• Price alerts

STEP 4: Save Layout
• Click 'Save Changes'
• Layout saved to your account
• Same view on all devices

QUICK ACTIONS FROM DASHBOARD:

• Search properties (always visible search bar)
• Contact agent (from any property)
• Schedule viewing (one click)
• Save to favorites (heart icon)
• Share property (social media)
• Compare properties (select multiple)
• Print property details
• Download documents
• Report issue
• Get help

MOBILE DASHBOARD:

On Mobile Devices:
• Simplified navigation
• Swipe between sections
• Bottom navigation bar
• All features accessible
• Touch-optimized interface
• Quick action buttons
• Same data synced across devices

PRO TIPS:

• Check dashboard daily for updates
• Respond to inquiries within 24 hours
• Keep favorite properties organized
• Use saved searches for efficiency
• Track all viewings in calendar
• Monitor deal progress regularly
• Update profile regularly
• Enable all notification types
• Use quick filters to find what you need
• Star important conversations

Your dashboard is your command center for all property activities!

customer_support.question: How can I contact customer support?
customer_support.answer:
We're here to help! Multiple ways to reach our support team:

Contact Methods:

1. In-App Chat (Fastest!)
• Click the chat icon at bottom right
• Available 7 days a week
• Average response time: 5-15 minutes
• Best for urgent questions

2. Email Support
• support@mjvirealty.com
• Response within 24 hours
• Best for detailed inquiries
• Attach screenshots if needed

3. Help Center
• Browse FAQs and guides
• Video tutorials
• Step-by-step articles
• Self-service resources

4. Social Media
• Facebook, Instagram, Twitter
• @MJVIRealty
• Good for general questions

5. Phone Support
• Available for urgent matters
• Business hours: Mon-Fri, 9AM-6PM
• (Number provided to registered users)

6. Schedule a Call
• Book a consultation with our team
• Property selling guidance
• Buying process walkthrough

Support Hours:
• Chat & Email: 7 days/week
• Phone: Monday-Friday, 9AM-6PM
• Emergency: 24/7 automated system

Pro Tip:
For account-specific issues, make sure you're logged in when contacting us so we can help faster!

We're committed to responding to every inquiry!

fallback_responses: I'm not sure I understand that question. Could you rephrase it? Or try selecting from the topics below:
Hmm, I don't have information about that yet. But I can help you with property listings, searching, making inquiries, and more! What would you like to know?
I'm still learning! For now, I can help you with getting started, listing properties, searching, making deals, and using our features. What interests you?
That's a great question! While I don't have that specific information, I can connect you with our support team for personalized help. Would you like to contact support?
closing_messages: Is there anything else I can help you with?
I hope that helps! Feel free to ask if you have more questions.
Got more questions? I'm here to help!
Need anything else? I'm always here to assist!
